title: The incredible logistics of F1 and how the sport moves more sustainably than ever around the world
content: Each Formula 1 outfit requires a vast amount of items to compete, and on the latest episode of the F1 Explains podcast, the team take a closer look at the behind-the-scenes logistics involved in moving these parts from race to race. Ahead of the Las Vegas Grand Prix, its promoters have launched a first-of-its-kind water conservation program, as they look to implement technologies that can reduce, and eventually offset, outdoor water consumption at large-scale sporting events. The water conservation program will be rolled out at the MGM Grand Hotel & Casino, in partnership with Southern Nevada Water Authority (SNWA), WaterStart and MGM Resorts. At scale, the water conservation program could make it possible for the event to be the first Net-Zero Water Consumption race in Formula 1 history.
author: Katie Osborne and Christian Hewgill

title: Which AI Tool Writes the Best Marketing Copy?
content: Even the most seasoned writer can struggle to keep up with demand, so taking advantage of the AI tools available to streamline your process and boost your productivity is crucial.AI copywriting combines natural language processing with machine learning to generate copy for social media, blogs, websites, landing pages, scripts, and more. Though AI generates the copy, the intention is for it to sound like a human wrote it. Furthermore, AI-generated copy is crafted quickly, helping marketers meet deadlines and allot more time toward other responsibilities.
author: Erica Santiago

title: The New Frontier: How AI Will Impact Businesses in 2023
content: Business leaders are always responsible for steering the ship and making big-picture decisions, so it’s no surprise that many are already implementing AI-powered tech into their business models and teams — with 62% reporting that their company has already invested in AI/automation tools for employees to leverage in their roles. And the trend will likely not only continue in 2023 but also steeply increase: 43% of business leaders say they plan to increase their investment in AI/automation tools over the course of 2023, and 31% of business leaders say AI/automation tools are very important to their overall business strategy.
author: Sara Freidman
